DOC.brief_summary: A study to determine the use of far infrared radiation for the treatment of prostate cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Far Infrared Radiation Treatment for Prostate Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Our initial assessment indicates that electromagnetic radiation of the central nervous system, the viscera and the endocrine system has the potential to cure a number of diseases, including prostate cancer.
DOC.criteria: Persons with Prostate, Bladder or Testicular Cancer.
DOC.keyword: Tumors or cancer of the prostate
